EmailTemplate.subject: RE: New Enrollment -Jennifer Ahearn (1391121703.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Jennifer, I wanted to follow up on the email below and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/Y3NJC> You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Thanks,Meghan ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Pui Chiu [mailto:pchiu@atriumstaff.com <mailto:pchiu@atriumstaff.com>] Sent: Thursday, January 30, 2014 3:41 PM To: Team Pfizer Cc: Erin Dwyer Subject: New Enrollment -Jennifer Ahearn Hello, Please contact the Jennifer to speak more about the MBO exec program. · Name: Jennifer Ahearn· Email: Ahearn.jen@gmail.com <mailto:Ahearn.jen@gmail.com>· Phone: (401) 398-0733 home· Drug/BG check required – Yes· Proposed start date – ASAP· Billing Rate (if known) – To be determined by Jennifer. - What type of work they are doing Requested Job Title: Laboratory AnalysisJob Description: Partner with colleagues in Scientific and Laboratory Services-Analytical Sciences (SLS-AS) to provide facilitation support to the Pfizer Peru Country Office for the transfer of analytical methods (AMTE) for multiple drug products to a designated Peru third party contract laboratory. Thanks! Pui Pui ChiuAssistant Program ManagerAtrium Managed Servicesp: 201.808.6516e: pchiu@atriumstaff.com <mailto:kdeutsch@atriumstaff.com>
